text: Tongue-in-cheek refers to a humorous or sarcastic statement expressed in a mock serious manner. Tongue-in-cheek may also refer to: * Tongue n' Cheek, a 2009 album by British rapper Dizzee Rascal * Tongue 'n' Cheek, a British electro music band ==See also== * The Anatomy of the Tongue in Cheek, a 2001 album by Christian rock band Relient K * Cheek (disambiguation)
title: Tongue-in-cheek (disambiguation)
